meanings.definition: Cook (food) on a rack over an open flame or hot coals.
meanings.sent1: Dad charbroils burgers on the grill every weekend.
meanings.sent2: The chef charbroils the steak to perfection on the barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The backyard smelled delicious as the grill charbroiled the sausages.
meanings.sent4: The flames charbroiled the marshmallows, turning them golden brown.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the meat as it charbroils is music to my ears.

meanings.definition: Burn (something, especially food) on a grill.
meanings.sent1: Be careful not to charbroil the chicken wings on the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally charbroiled the hot dogs, making them too crispy.
meanings.sent3: The cook managed to charbroil the toast, creating a crunchy surprise.
meanings.sent4: The flames seemed to charbroil the vegetables in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The smell of charbroiled meat wafted through the air, making everyone hungry.
